languages.text: "Конечно, Ваша Светлость. Мы бесконечно уважаем его за мудрость, а он платит нам за это вниманием и добротой". {n}Голос девушки звучит тепло.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, Ваша милость. Мы бесконечно уважаем его за мудрость, а он платит нам за это вниманием и добротой". {n}Голос девушки звучит тепло.{/n}

languages.text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly.{/n}

languages.text: 「仰るとおりです、陛下。私達は彼の知性を大いに尊敬しておりますし、彼も思いやりあふれる心遣いを見せてくださいます」{n}アスタルチアは熱心に説く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「仰るとおりです、陛下。私達は彼の知性を大いに尊敬しておりますし、彼も思いやりあふれる心遣いを見せてくださいます」{n}アスタルチアは熱心に説く。{/n}

languages.text: “当然，大人。我们非常尊重他的智慧，他对我们的关注与仁慈，让我们受益匪浅。”{n}她热情地说道{/n}。
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当然，大人。我们非常尊重他的智慧，他对我们的关注与仁慈，让我们受益匪浅。”{n}她热情地说道{/n}。

languages.text: «Absolutamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sentimos un gran respeto por su sabiduría y él nos lo paga con atención y amabilidad», {n}declara en tono afable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Absolutamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sentimos un gran respeto por su sabiduría y él nos lo paga con atención y amabilidad», {n}declara en tono afable.{/n}

languages.text: « Bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. Nous avons le plus grand respect pour sa sagesse, et il n'a jamais fait preuve que de bonté et de prévenance à notre égard, » {n}déclare-t-elle d'une voix chaleureuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. Nous avons le plus grand respect pour sa sagesse, et il n'a jamais fait preuve que de bonté et de prévenance à notre égard, » {n}déclare-t-elle d'une voix chaleureuse.{/n}

languages.text: "Unbedingt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir respektieren ihn sehr für seine Weisheit, und er widmet uns dafür Aufmerksamkeit und Güte", {n}sagt sie warm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Unbedingt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir respektieren ihn sehr für seine Weisheit, und er widmet uns dafür Aufmerksamkeit und Güte", {n}sagt sie warm.{/n}

languages.text: "Haşa {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Abelard'ın bilgeliğine saygımız sonsuz. O da ilgi ve nezaketiyle bizi karşılıksız koymuyor." {n}Sözcükler, ağzından samimiyetle çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Absolutely, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We greatly respect him for his wisdom, and he repays us with attention and kindness," {n}she says warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hâşâ {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Abelard'ın bilgeliğine saygımız sonsuz; o da bize ilgi ve nezaketiyle hakkımızı ödüyor," {n}diyor samimice.{/n}
